ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Just wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: Doesn t it have the same stats as Icetooth s claws? might be able to get those cheaper and they are light. Just /punt me if I m thinking about the wrong sword
ygData.messageBody:
Doesn't it have the same stats as Icetooth's claws? might be able to get those cheaper and they are light. Just /punt me if I'm thinking about the wrong sword here but what I am thinking is a 11/29, don't remember weight.
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Tuesday, March 13, 2001 8:28 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Just wondering...


Does not bother me, but I am on Tunare.  So I cant help you.

Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Steven Wong [mailto:steven_wck@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 13, 2001 8:16 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Just wondering...


Hi all,

I just joined this group and was wondering whether we
can use this to look for items.

Actually I am looking for a Crystalized Sword for my
warrior on Xev server. If any of you has one and wants
to sell it, let me know okay?

Lastly if this group is not meant to buy/sell/look for
stuff, please let me know as well so that I won't do
that again here :)

Thanks!
